TopicTitle: Kuran Kuran - This is the moon Laythe

Articles.Content:
I have adapted Duran Duran's song "This is Planet Earth" to be more apt for Kerbal ears. Here it is:

Only came outside to watch the parts fall with debris

I heard you making rockets fly

Like some new Kerbal calculating delta-v

You'll see I'm right some other time

Look now, look all around, there's no fuel left

Voices, another sound, can you hear me now?

This is the moon Laythe you're looking at the moon Laythe

Io Callisto Europa this is the moon Laythe

My helmet's stuck between two tanks

Let me know if you're coming down to land

Are there any craft out there trying rendezvous?

My eyes are so cloudy I can't see Jool

Look now, look all around, there's no fuel left

Voices, another sound, can you hear me now

This is the moon Laythe you're looking at the moon Laythe

Io Callisto Europa this is the moon Laythe

Io Callisto Europa calling the moon Laythe

Io Callisto Europa looking at the moon Laythe

Io Callisto Europa this is the moon Laythe
